channel.title: I need help with compile/running client
channel.description: so when i compile it says unable to find location when my classpath and path are both C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin i also tried C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe well anyway none work and the compile doesnt work, and when i start the server it says beginning in 3.....2.....1..... and nothing happens. i am using torvapkz client/source

item.title: I need help with compile/running client
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:4, topic:439276”] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/quote]

Use exactly as he gave you!

Right click your batch file and click edit…its really easy.

Change your jdk or jre or whatever.

We are not a spoon feeding community.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with compile/running client
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I really wish moderators for this section would clean it out more. About 45% of the questions here affiliate with client sided material. It is not that hard to read the rules of this board and I don’t really understand how you could miss the keyword ‘client’ in Private Server Client Hacking. I can understand that not as many people visit that section as they do this one, but that still does not add an exception for not following regulation. Thank you for those that actually read this.

Read full topic

i already tried putting that in classpath but its weird bec. every1 else has jdk1.7.0_03 mine is jdk1.7.0_02 and i have the latest java updates.

Read full topic
